creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: half circle shaped pendant on flower link chain; 17 tubes attached to top, rounded edge; motifs on panel around top edge include rat, water-buffalo, cat ,bunny, dragon, snake, horse, deer (?), monkey, rooster, dog, pig; on center panel two birds standing on a mountain with a dragon between them; 17 chime-like pieces dangle from the flat edge; horizontal ridges on back
dimension: 21 3/8 x 12 3/4 x 1 in. (54.29 x 32.39 x 2.54 cm) (including dangles)
title: Pendant
